languages.text: "Шер.. Вольный Торговец. Мы вместе через кучу дерьма прошли, так что уж простите мне дерзость грядущих слов". {n}Голос Джай спокоен и тих, подобно морю перед надвигающейся бурей.{/n} "Я всегда была преданна вам, словно самой себе. И благодарна за каждую милость, которой вы меня одарили".

"Sher— Rogue Trader. We've been through a lot of shit together, so forgive the impertinence of what I'm about to say." {n}Jae's voice is calm and quiet, like the sea before an impending storm.{/n} "I've been as loyal to you as I am to my own self. And I've been grateful for every favour you've bestowed upon me."
languages.original_text: "Шер.. Вольный Торговец. Мы вместе через кучу дерьма прошли, так что уж простите мне дерзость грядущих слов". {n}Голос Джай спокоен и тих, подобно морю перед надвигающейся бурей.{/n} "Я всегда была преданна вам, словно самой себе. И благодарна за каждую милость, которой вы меня одарили".

We've been through a lot of shit together, so forgive the impertinence of what I'm about to say." {n}Jae's voice is calm and quiet, like the sea before an impending storm.{/n} "I've been as loyal to you as I am to my own self. And I've been grateful for every favour you've bestowed upon me."

languages.text: "Sher ... {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Wir beide haben viel Scheiße erlebt, also verzeiht mir die Impertinenz dessen, was ich gleich sagen werde." {n}Jaes Stimme ist ruhig wie das Meer vor einem nahenden Sturm.{/n} "Ich war Euch und mir selbst gegenüber immer loyal. Und ich bin dankbar für jede Gefälligkeit, die Ihr mir erwiesen habt."
languages.original_text: "Sher— Rogue Trader. We've been through a lot of shit together, so forgive the impertinence of what I'm about to say." {n}Jae's voice is calm and quiet, like the sea before an impending storm.{/n} "I've been as loyal to you as I am to my own self. And I've been grateful for every favour you've bestowed upon me."

traits.locale_text: "Sher ... {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Wir beide haben viel Scheiße erlebt, also verzeiht mir die Impertinenz dessen, was ich gleich sagen werde." {n}Jaes Stimme ist ruhig wie das Meer vor einem nahenden Sturm.{/n} "Ich war Euch und mir selbst gegenüber immer loyal. Und ich bin dankbar für jede Gefälligkeit, die Ihr mir erwiesen habt."

languages.text: « Sher... {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}. Après tout ce que nous avons traversé ensemble, j'espère que vous pardonnerez l'impertinence de ce que je m'apprête à vous dire, {n}commence Jae d'une voix calme comme la mer avant la tempête.{/n} Je me suis montrée aussi loyale envers vous qu'envers moi-même, et j'ai toujours été reconnaissante des faveurs que vous m'avez accordées. »
languages.original_text: "Sher— Rogue Trader. We've been through a lot of shit together, so forgive the impertinence of what I'm about to say." {n}Jae's voice is calm and quiet, like the sea before an impending storm.{/n} "I've been as loyal to you as I am to my own self. And I've been grateful for every favour you've bestowed upon me."

traits.locale_text: « Sher... {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}. Après tout ce que nous avons traversé ensemble, j'espère que vous pardonnerez l'impertinence de ce que je m'apprête à vous dire, {n}commence Jae d'une voix calme comme la mer avant la tempête.{/n} Je me suis montrée aussi loyale envers vous qu'envers moi-même, et j'ai toujours été reconnaissante des faveurs que vous m'avez accordées. »

languages.text: “亲——行商浪人，我们一起经历过很多操蛋事，所以我接下来的话可能会有点冒犯，希望你能原谅。”{n}婕伊的声音非常平静，没有一丝波澜，仿佛暴雨来临前的海面。{/n}“我对你就像我对我自己一样忠诚，我一直很感激你对我的所有帮助。”
languages.original_text: "Sher— Rogue Trader. We've been through a lot of shit together, so forgive the impertinence of what I'm about to say." {n}Jae's voice is calm and quiet, like the sea before an impending storm.{/n} "I've been as loyal to you as I am to my own self. And I've been grateful for every favour you've bestowed upon me."

traits.locale_text: “亲——行商浪人，我们一起经历过很多操蛋事，所以我接下来的话可能会有点冒犯，希望你能原谅。”{n}婕伊的声音非常平静，没有一丝波澜，仿佛暴雨来临前的海面。{/n}“我对你就像我对我自己一样忠诚，我一直很感激你对我的所有帮助。”

languages.text: «Sher... Comerciante Independiente, hemos pasado por mucha mierda junt{mf|o|a}s, así que perdone la impertinencia de lo que voy a decir». {n}La voz de Jae es tranquila y queda, como el mar antes de la tormenta.{/n} «Le he mostrado tanta lealtad a usted como a mí misma, y le estoy agradecida por todos los favores que me ha concedido».
languages.original_text: "Sher— Rogue Trader. We've been through a lot of shit together, so forgive the impertinence of what I'm about to say." {n}Jae's voice is calm and quiet, like the sea before an impending storm.{/n} "I've been as loyal to you as I am to my own self. And I've been grateful for every favour you've bestowed upon me."

traits.locale_text: «Sher... Comerciante Independiente, hemos pasado por mucha mierda junt{mf|o|a}s, así que perdone la impertinencia de lo que voy a decir». {n}La voz de Jae es tranquila y queda, como el mar antes de la tormenta.{/n} «Le he mostrado tanta lealtad a usted como a mí misma, y le estoy agradecida por todos los favores que me ha concedido».

languages.text: 「シャ…自由開拓者だ。一緒に様々な体験をしてきたんだ。今から言うことは不謹慎かもしれないが、許してくれ」{n}ジェイの声は穏やかで静かで、嵐の前の海のようだ。{/n}「あたしは自分自身へと同じくらい、あんたにも誠意を尽くしてきた。それに、あんたが与えてくれた便宜には感謝しているよ」
languages.original_text: "Sher— Rogue Trader. We've been through a lot of shit together, so forgive the impertinence of what I'm about to say." {n}Jae's voice is calm and quiet, like the sea before an impending storm.{/n} "I've been as loyal to you as I am to my own self. And I've been grateful for every favour you've bestowed upon me."

traits.locale_text: 「シャ…自由開拓者だ。一緒に様々な体験をしてきたんだ。今から言うことは不謹慎かもしれないが、許してくれ」{n}ジェイの声は穏やかで静かで、嵐の前の海のようだ。{/n}「あたしは自分自身へと同じくらい、あんたにも誠意を尽くしてきた。それに、あんたが与えてくれた便宜には感謝しているよ」

languages.text: "Şir... Hür Tacir. Birlikte çok şey atlattık, şu söyleyeceklerimi maruz görüver." {n}Jae'ın sesi, denizin tayfun çıkmadan evvelki hâlini andırırcasına dingin ve sakin.{/n} "Sadakatte kendime etmediğim kusuru sana da etmedim. Bana bahşettiğin her iyilik için de minnettar oldum."
languages.original_text: "Sher— Rogue Trader. We've been through a lot of shit together, so forgive the impertinence of what I'm about to say." {n}Jae's voice is calm and quiet, like the sea before an impending storm.{/n} "I've been as loyal to you as I am to my own self. And I've been grateful for every favour you've bestowed upon me."
